summary: This project, an e-commerce data visualization platform, included design deliverables including a style guide, home page, and responsive web application. Additional mockups available upon request.
This B2B web application allows users to design, configure, and deploy chatbots at scale. Deliverables included wireframes, prototypes, and marketing materials.

While the actual mobile application (currently in development) is under NDA, we performed an accessibility audit for the marketing website. The color palette and typographical styles from the Style Guide are included below.
This data visualization depicts data regarding child opportunity research from Brandeis University.
This application is for the management of life insurance, investments, and debt. ase study available upon request.
For this project we created a custom Wordpress site for a mid-size real estate agency. Additional deliverables included brand identity guidelines, logo, and copy.
